main.title: Hello, my name is Benjamin Bastidas. I'm a <color>Frontend</color> and <color>Backend</color> Developer.
main.text: I like to design and develop modern and intuitive websites that are appealing and can positively influence people.

about.title: About me
about.text: As a web developer I am focused on creating attractive pages with positive impact. I really enjoy teamwork, I'm a self-taught person with a competitive spirit that drives me to learn and improve continually in search of improvement and growth.

cards.title: Teamwork
cards.description: Working as a team is an important aspect when it comes to developing a project; the synergy and communication between people are essential for a good development.

cards.title: Organization
cards.description: Whenever it comes to working as an individual or in a team, I believe it is essential to have a well-organized way to carry out a project, organization is the key to an efficient development.

cards.title: Competitiveness
cards.description: In order to have continuous personal growth and motivation; it is necessary to have a healthy competitiveness to achieve great things and to keep improving constantly.

cards.title: Continuous learning
cards.description: It is very important to constantly keep studying and learning new things, knowing the basis and methods to be self-taught and to have a constant learning process

cards.title: Dealing with problems
cards.description: Problems are present in our day to day life, knowing how to solve them and learn from them will help us how to cope with them in a better way in the future.

cards.title: Adaptive
cards.description: Being able to be responsive to change and being able to adapt to new challenges is one of the most valuable skills to have as a person as well as a developer.

sections.title: Context
sections.description: When I was working on this project, I was in my final semester of my degree. This project served as my final assignment, where we were tasked with developing both a website and a mobile application. I took responsibility for the website development, while most of my peers focused on the mobile application.

sections.title: Objective
sections.description: The objective of this project was to assist individuals in finding their desired products at the best prices, leveraging community feedback to facilitate informed purchasing decisions. The application aimed to enhance what some existing websites offer, while incorporating additional features and a stronger focus on computational aspects.

sections.title: Design
sections.description: The design process involved collaborative work within my group using Figma for wireframing. Our primary goal was to ensure user-friendly navigation, especially for those less acquainted with computational aspects. As for the website's logo design (Robot), I crafted it using Adobe Illustrator. Additionally, I incorporated animations into the logo using Adobe After Effects and lottieFiles. While I was initially unfamiliar with these tools, they greatly enhanced the visual appeal and engagement of the project.

sections.title: Scraping
sections.description: The products showcased on the website were extracted from other platforms using the scraping technique. At that time, delving into web scraping was both daunting and challenging, given my theoretical knowledge of scraping and my desire to execute it using Python, a language I had never used before. Surprisingly, I found it relatively straightforward to comprehend, benefiting from a solid programming foundation.

sections.title: Context
sections.description: This project was born out of my desire to advance my web development skills and delve into the world of emerging technologies. At that time, I was keen to learn and gain experience with Next.js, a cutting-edge framework, and to apply the latest libraries and development practices.

sections.title: Security
sections.description: To ensure the security of this website, I consciously decided to use certain tools known for being strong and effective in web development security. I added the "Next Auth" library, which helps with user authentication and access control, and also included "Bcrypt" to keep passwords safe and encrypted.

sections.title: Stack
sections.description: I built this project using a blend of modern and efficient technologies. On the client side, I leveraged Next.js for its performance and smooth user experience. For the server, I utilized Prisma as an ORM tool. MongoDB served as the database, providing efficiency and scalability. Additionally, I integrated Cloudinary for storing and optimizing images.

sections.title: Context
sections.description: This project was one of my earliest experiences with "React", and it played a pivotal role in helping me grasp the fundamental concepts of this library. It allowed me to become acquainted with React's ecosystem and taught me how to consume APIs using it. Coming from a background of web development with "PHP", this framework introduced a significant departure from what I had been accustomed to.

sections.title: Design
sections.description: Creating this Pokedex started with planning and designing in Figma. I used Figma to map out how the Pokedex would look and where everything would go. I played around with different colors, how things were laid out, and how users could interact with it.
